channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-7451] pass function name in create/drop function to authorization api
item.description: If function names are passed to the authorization api for create/drop function calls, then authorization decisions can be made based on the function names as well.
item.summary: pass function name in create/drop function to authorization api

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
